website_summaries.verdict: Meat-based formulas like Purina Pro Plan are considered healthier for dogs than cheaper grain-based varieties. We like the scientific balance of ingredients and the hard-soft kibble mixture. Inspect bags before first use.
pros: Real chicken is the first listed ingredient
Rice and other grains easier to digest than corn and wheat
Satisfying blend of hard and soft kibble, easier on dog's teeth
cons: Some reports of insect larvae or meal worms inside unopened bags
Kibble size may be too large for smaller breeds
Gradual shift from other foods vital for dog's digestive system

customer_reviews.title: She says it gives them great nutrition and is affordable
customer_reviews.text: I switched to this dog food from Blue Buffalo, my sister in law is a vet tech and this is what she feeds her dogs. She says it gives them great nutrition and is affordable. My dog especially loves the shredded bits. If you found this review helpful, please click yes :)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley BouchardTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Pantry moths in the most recent delivery
customer_reviews.text: Have been purchasing this dog food from Amazon for a couple of years now. I have six dogs and buy three bags each month. It was convenient, I thought, not to have to go to a specialty pet store for the food. At least one bag of this last batch was full of pantry moths. I will not purchase it again, as I am familiar with how destructive and invasive pantry moths are. Very disappointed in this decline in quality from a premium product.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it & they’re all happy & healthy. Can’t complain one bit.
customer_reviews.text: Despite the fact that I get hassled by some of my well-meaning fellow dog people about using this food, my dogs love it and they have thrived on it for years. I confess I fell for the trend of grain-free, cage-free, gluten-free, organic, limited ingredient, etc foods. My dogs seemed ready to organize a hunger strike. So I switched back permanently & everyone gets the proplan shredded blend that best suits their dietary needs (puppy, senior, adult, or small breed). And they’re all healthy with great coats, nice teeth, high (so high!) energy. And it’s moderately priced so I don’t have to starve myself to feed my dogs (but I totally would if I had to!).
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Bugs in kibble / white fuzz
customer_reviews.text: Found worms crawling out of my dog's kibble. Never realized what this white stuff has been on the dog food until one was crawling out. Always thought it was part of their food like baking flour . They are called mealworms and can invest in your house and take over your food.I will tell you they don't harm the dogs, but I have 5 dogs and lately they are throwing up.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Good dog food and value
customer_reviews.text: A couple of our dogs are sensitive to just about every ingredient in most dog foods. So we've tried a lot of brands and flavors. So far this one seems like it has been the easiest on our dogs' stomachs and they really like it. And it is considerably cheaper than most brands we've been through. That's a good thing, since 3 of them are over 65 pounds. My only negative would be that the food ships in an enormous box. They could easily shop it in a box half the size.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: This food was recommended by our vet
customer_reviews.text: This food was recommended by our vet. My normal dog loves this food and wolfs it down at every meal. My picky dog will begrudgingly eat it when he realizes he's not getting any "people food" as a topper. Neither dog gets the "squeegies" after eating this food, unlike some more expensive brands. Lots of solid turds in our back yard!
customer_reviews.author: AustinJCollins

customer_reviews.title: Delicious...he told me so
customer_reviews.text: We have a 55lb lab/Shepherd mix (Gunner) and he absolutely loves this food. He doesn’t always eat his food, but we feed him 3/4 cup in the morning and at night which typically lasts us about 30-35 days. This food does not have a horrible smell like some other foods out there and seems to be easy on his stomach since he never has trouble with pooping. We will stick with this food until he decides that it isn’t for him anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Medicine Man

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Food My Dog Loves and Her Itching Has Decreased Significantly
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food. She’s been eating it for several months now. She is very happy with the combination of soft and crunchy textures. Of note, her itching has diminished drastically since on this food even though it’s not grain free. I don’t think it’s a coincidence. She’s has had a major itching problem for several years due to seasonal allergies (although she is affected year round as we live in the south) that has required prescription medication and she barely scratches now. Is it the new food? I’m not 100% sure but I will definitely keep feeding her this.
customer_reviews.author: T. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: I don't eat the stuff but she is pretty happy with it
customer_reviews.text: The only dog food my picky golden retriever will eat. I don't eat the stuff but she is pretty happy with it. The only thing stopping me from giving it a 5 star is the bag closer. There isn't one. gotta use a clothespin type. She doesn't like the food if we pot it into a bucket storage container.
customer_reviews.author: j mack

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs used to like it, but now do not eat it
customer_reviews.text: We had been buying this brand of dog food for years and our dogs really like it. But there has been something wrong with the past few batches. They have been leaving some of the food leftover. And more recently, they stopped eating it all together. We switched to a different brand and they wolf it down. We will not be purchasing this again.
customer_reviews.author: W. James Dittmar

customer_reviews.title: Our dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Our 14-year-old dog suddenly stopped eating Science Diet, so we tried Pro Plan Savor with Shredded Chicken. She loves it. The medium-sized kibble is easy for her to chew, and she really goes after the shredded chicken. We recommend this food. Our vet considers it a close second to Science Diet.
customer_reviews.author: Dalai Mama

customer_reviews.title: Let Prime Deliver To Your Door!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 4 year old pudelpointer and a 6 year old cockapoo and we use Prime to deliver this huge bag of food to our door each month. First, the price is directly competitive with a box store and, second, I don't have to carry the heavy awkward back a half mile across a parking lot and back home. The food itself is great quality, we have never had any issues and the dogs both love it. My pudelpointer is an active hunter and he will scarf this down and keep right on running. We will stick with this as long as Purina keeps making it!
customer_reviews.author: OleMissLaw

customer_reviews.title: Worst breath ever.
customer_reviews.text: My 2 dogs ate this for about 6 months or so. We noticed their breath was bad. Not "dog breath" bad but clear out a room bad. I didn't Attribute it to the food. Had their teeth cleaned by vet. No change. Changed their food and less than a week into new food and their bad breath is gone. I feel so bad that I put them through so much time like that.
customer_reviews.author: TLE

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!!! We had bugs in every single bag for the last 2 years. I thought the small white things on some of the pieces were just flour or something until tonight when I broke it open and saw little bugs come out! Gross!!!! The only reason I looked further is because I saw meal worms while I was scooping my dogs dinner. Crappy thing is... we are almost 2/3 into this bag and MANY others had the fuzzy white spots. I feel so awful feeding my dogs this tainted food, worst part is- one of our picky dogs actually loves this food. :-(
customer_reviews.author: kew

customer_reviews.title: Bloody Poop
customer_reviews.text: I gave it one start because my dog seemed to like eating it, but we had to pay a $192 vet bill after we found blood in his poop. The vet said the food was likely infected with a bacteria. Thanfully, Amazon offered a full refund on the order.
customer_reviews.author: S Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good food
customer_reviews.text: My dog was eating Pure balance from Walmart, and he was having a lot of allergies during the day. The doctor recommended this brand as his fur was really suffering with his allergies. He is doing pretty good with this brand since then. This was the third time I got his food from Amazon, and the only time I had issues with it was the second time, when I could not find any of the shreds inside of the food. This one was pretty much good so we are happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gee

customer_reviews.title: Gave my dog terrible diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a good buy for the price and my dog seemed to like it. She didn’t love it, but she would eat it. She had terrible diarrhea for over a month and I took her to the vet thinking she had giardia. Turns out she had no infection and when I changed her food the diarrhea went away immediately.
customer_reviews.author: MN white male middle-aged resident #2769

customer_reviews.title: Worms crawling in my dogs food
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to check the bags completely for worms....I was horrified that I found worms crawling in my dogs food...To my horror, it did not notice it until day 2.....I had just opened the bag the day before and put the contents in a sealed dog food container.....Today, on the kibbles were nasty little worms crawling....My husband and I dumped the entire container into trash bags and inspected the entire contents....some kibbles had white spots like silky strings on the kibbles....the entire $45.00 bag was infected with different stages of larvae.....There is not one tell at amazon, so please look at the entire bag before you dump into your dog container and feed your pet.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M.

customer_reviews.title: Finally. He loves it.
customer_reviews.text: We have feed our 11 yo Aussie iVet for years. He started to refuse to eat. And we've been worried. Finally, I contacted his breeder, and she recommended ProPlan. He literally TORE INTO THE BAG. He wolfed it down. It was such a relief. She said "Oh wait for his coat to come in - it's going to really improve and you'll notice a big difference." Purina is a company you can trust. Unlike "Blue Buffalo" which my friend a vet and also our OWN vet said to avoid like, crazy. Thank goodness, we've been worried so much. Thanks Purina.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy for Aussie Dogs

customer_reviews.title: Best kibble you can buy
customer_reviews.text: My dog literally drools when I go to scoop this. PPP is a high quality kibble I suggest to anyone. My dog was on purina one for awhile but after doing research I did the swtich. Her eyes have never been bright and her coat and never been shinier. Plus because it's high quality I use less. One bag lasts my 85 lb mutt for about 2 months. Buy this if you care about giving your dog the best but also have a budget to keep to. You dont need to spend 80 dollars on food to have a beautiful and healthy dog Added pic of how my dog looks after two months on PPP
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: Will never order dog food from Amazon again!
customer_reviews.text: We are on our third bag of this food. We always keep it in an air-tight container. Today, with the latest bag I noticed larvae and bugs crawling out of white nests in the chicken pieces. I wonder how much of this we have accidentally fed our dogs? I’m disgusted. They look like copra beetles. So gross. I will never order dog food from Amazon again. DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I have now been using this dog for for over a month
customer_reviews.text: and my dog could not be healthier. All the issues she was having with diarrhea and upset stomach on Blue Buffalo have gone away. Sensitivity to certain snacks and treats has gone away. She was never excited about eating Blue Buffalo but now she loves meal times. I so regret wasting money on such an expensive food before. And I stock with it because people claimed it was a good food. I did a lot of research on Purina and other dog foods. I got advice from two vets locally. And I am very happy I made this choice and I believe my puppy is too.
customer_reviews.author: Jason R

customer_reviews.title: and she started getting bad allergies, irritated and smelled yeasty until I changed ...
customer_reviews.text: This dog food is FABULOUS! My dog was eating IAMS from Walmart, the green bag, and she started getting bad allergies, irritated and smelled yeasty until I changed dog foods. Purina Pro Plan cleared that up-it works MUCH better than IAMS by FAR!! I also feed her some fresh game & veggies in the AM to start off the day. But even though I was feeding the fresh food along w/the IAMS, this Purina Pro Plan is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Both my dogs and even my cat enjoy this food!
customer_reviews.text: I have a cocker spaniel and at mixed breed that both enjoy this food greatly. My mixed breed is a VERY picky eater. She would only eat her kibble if it had some "extra" in it - gravy, pan drippings, chopped up real meat, etc. Plain kibble and she would walk away and only eat when she was "desperate". We tried 4 or 5 different "fancy" brands one of those had freeze dried meat bits in it. She loved that one ( was super expensive!). So my wife found this and we've been golden ever since! We've caught our cat picking out the chicken bits in it when the dog wasn't looking as well.
customer_reviews.author: P. Cahill

customer_reviews.title: Something wrong with this food.
customer_reviews.text: Something has changed in either the formulation or production of this dog food. The difference is noticeable as soon as you open the bag.... and I have now tried two bags with different lot numbers and dates. Both have upset my dog’s stomach! I called Purina and they said there has been no planned change to the food...but something is wrong.
customer_reviews.author: adrienne staff

customer_reviews.title: No more GRAIN FREE.  Check out the date re high levels of BMP! and decide for yourself
customer_reviews.text: I know many of you have heard about the GRAIN FREE contriversary. The folks at Purina have an extensive research lab experience regarding balanced nutrition, etc. I have switched from the more 'boutique' dog food companies because of the recent rise in BMP levels in dogs on grain free dog foods. Check it out and decide for your selves.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Branson & Barbara Branson

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog sick
customer_reviews.text: We have been feeding our dog this for years. I believe we got a tainted bag. After eating it he got sick and had to go to the vet. After reading from another person that their dog got sick from the same food ordered on Amazon. I believe this food was either old or stored n an unsafe environment.
customer_reviews.author: Nettie

customer_reviews.title: My dog lives for this
customer_reviews.text: We needed a new and one that had good ingredients. The vet suggested Purina pro or royal Canine and we went with this since it was cheaper. It had chunks of dried chicken in it which my pup loves. After a full bag of this I’ve seen her energy, coat and body composition change drastically for the better. Although it’s more expensive it is actually good for your pups and worth it! Buy the bigger bags on sale and put it on auto ship which also gives you a discount
customer_reviews.author: Trip Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Our dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We switched to this brand from Blue Buffalo on a recommendation from our vet and others. Before, our dog was so sluggish and had no energy. He would let his food sit and only take small nibbles of the food. Now, as soon as he hears me scooping this food into his bowl he comes running and stands there and gobbles the entire bowl down and looks for me when he's done! He also is much more energetic! Within a month of eating the new food, his coat has gotten so much more soft and shiny. Definitely will be purchasing another bag!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Long-time customer! Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: We have been feeding this food to our dogs for about 10 years. It was recommended by our vet when we found out our lab couldn't tolerate beef. All of our dogs seem to enjoy this food. We have several different breeds of dogs, including a husky and a terrier mix, so it's versatile between the different breeds and sizes. It has two textures. One is the traditional harder pellets and the other is a more natural shaped (slightly softer) piece. Our cat would eat this if we let him!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: All my animals flock to this food...even the ones not allowed to
customer_reviews.text: First i think its funny they ask about the taste. LETS BE CLEAR I DIDNT TASTE IT! But my dog likes it. And it must be extra tasty because the cats try and eat it too. And usually they avoid her food. We transitioned to this food (as of all the positive things i’ve seen), with no problems. She tolerated well. No issues. I should also mention my pup is extremely picky with food. And she will eat this! Will continue to buy
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: My lab mix 8mth old pups love it
customer_reviews.text: A more affordable, healthier option. Not the perfect ingredient list but far above the average. This is easy to find if you run out too. The pups grew up on the puppy formula and transitioned to this easily. Only thing for us is that they don't eat this by itself dry, but that's probably human error. If I could turn back time, I'd enforce that they eat only dry food accept for treat times.... But I digress..
customer_reviews.author: Silly Butt

customer_reviews.title: REAL shredded chicken your dog will love!
customer_reviews.text: My dog's poop should be on an outdoor ad, that's how beautiful it looks. I noticed a lot of improvement on my dog, reducing the "waste", even the smell of the feces is decreased. He will eat all of the shredded chicken first and the hard parts later. I feel like it the bites were bigger he wouldn't like it as much, but being a chihuahua, I'm glad this one suits him. My dog's coat is beautiful and shining and I cannot recommend this brand and line enough!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Diarrhea for all 3 of my dogs...ugh
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted my dogs to eat this product and even though i introduced it to them slowly, all 3 had bad diarrhea and pooped all over my beautiful area rugs(why not the hard wood floors or the tile??? Ugh) I gave it a good try but back to Instinct which is way more $$$$:(
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by nutritionists
customer_reviews.text: I switched my dogs to Purina Pro Plan based on the pet nutritionists recommendation after the DCM scare that exploded over the dangers of grain free dog food. My dogs were spoiled with what was supposed to be high premium grain free dog food for years. But with Purina Pro Plan being one of the very few the nutritionists will recommend now, that’s what they get and they really do seem to like it okay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog's favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Don't know what they put in this stuff but this is my dog's favorite food. We have been rotating bags every time she finishes them, one after the other, for two years. This is the only food she goes head down into her bowl for, and licks the bowl when it's empty. Why this is significant: my dog is the least food-motivated dog I've ever known. She has no interest in food. It is not unusual for her to go 24-36 hours without eating. This food changed that pattern! She LOVES it!
customer_reviews.author: rascalfishy

customer_reviews.title: High quality food that my dogs love
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food! I was actually given this in the canned version by my veterinary internist, prior to this I would never have fed my dogs Purina-I thought all Purina was cheap grocery store food. But this food is wonderful quality, the dogs absolutely love it and their coats are softer & shinier since changing to this food, from grain free over two years ago.
customer_reviews.author: JJones

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Price for Huge Bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a 35.5 pound bag for my two 15lb dogs. It took them three months to go through it and at the end, they were bored of the flavor. The price for the size though can’t be beat! If it didn’t take so long for them to go through it and if the bags weren’t so huge, I would buy two flavor and switch every month to month and a half.
customer_reviews.author: TamLG

customer_reviews.title: My three pups love this food.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this line of food. During one of my hounds last vet check up I was asked what type of food they eat and when I told him pro plan he said that was excellent food to feed them. Always glad to hear the food your pets are eating is approved by a Veterinarian themselves.
customer_reviews.author: G. Hollon

customer_reviews.title: Great pet food, but it's a lot!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food. However, the bag that I ordered was 18 lbs and was a bit too much. I think he's getting tired of it. When he first started eating it, he would gobble it down. Now, he slowly eats it and sometimes doesn't finish it. I think that he needs more variety. I will order this food again, but will get a much smaller bag since I only have one dog.
customer_reviews.author: Demon reader

customer_reviews.title: Dogs like it and no adverse side effects
customer_reviews.text: Dogs like it and no adverse side effects. We add variety for dogs so they eat it dry or wet with water, can food, or additive purée. Would prefer more Omegas added for better coat as we do need to add this cost and hassle by adding ShedX to this food every meal. Their coats are much silkier and less shedding when fed the ProPlan salmon but is a struggle to get them to eat it because not fans of fish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Dog loves the crunchy parts
customer_reviews.text: Canned food is rediculously high priced imo. I have lost so much money buying dry food that my dog refuses to eat. She loves the crunchy bits of this. I thought she would like the soft bits but she didn't even lick one of those. I'm ok with that, I'll leave those out for the wild critters. I'm thrilled that after a year I finally found a dry food my Doodle likes!
customer_reviews.author: Earandsea

customer_reviews.title: The price has gone up considerably. That''s why I'm giving the poor rating.
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying Purina Pro Plan Savor chicken and rice(35# bag) ever since I adopted my dog 2 years ago. I think the price started off at $34 (with free shipping since I'm a Prime Member) and his been going up in price ever since. Currently, there are a number of buying options from Amazon. Prices now vary from $57.95 with free shipping , $44.24plus $25.45 shipping. The highest price is $100.29 with free shipping. My dog likes the food. Her vet recommended the food. But I'll be buying this from another place besides Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: JJW

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it! Even my picky eater
customer_reviews.text: After asking my vet what food he recommended for my 3 Goldens, he admitted he uses Purina for his own dogs. We had tried a few different brands including science diet, Iams and 4 health and diamond naturals (both from tractor supply) I have 1 picky eater! But, they all 3 love this food! Ordering from amazon and it being delivered to my door is almost too easy!! So glad I started doing this. Saves my special trips to tractor supply (30 miles away)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Mc, Al.

customer_reviews.title: Greyhounds like it.
customer_reviews.text: We have picky greyhounds so we are constantly searching for a food they will eat. They love this food. It was recommended by someone in an online greyhound group, so we tried it. We have 3 greyhounds and they cleaned their bowls the first night. They don’t always eat it at breakfast time but they have been consistently eating it for dinner. The food is larger kibble and more than one shape.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne D

customer_reviews.title: He thrives on this food and has a beautiful, shiny coat
customer_reviews.text: Naturally, serve this for meals, but also occasionally use for training. My dog loves it and responds to the food as he would to any training treat. He thrives on this food and has a beautiful, shiny coat. Have had to contact Purina in the past (for a separate issue) and the company was very responsive to my issue and resolved everything to my satisfaction. I am very happy with the company and this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Q Public

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I got a bad bag?
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are about halfway through this bag and refused to keep eating it. They both got extreme diarrhea and when I took them to the vet one has severe pancreatitis. Unfortunately my window for return/refund has passed but I was stuck with a $1000 vet bill.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Nice shiny coat
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with Purina ProPlan Savor. My pointer and Great Pyrenees are in very good condition and healthy. Their coats are shiny. They are picky but they like ProPlan Savor. They eat it with no problems. I would recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: He Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: I guess I'm more susceptible to good advertising than I realized; I ordered this food after viewing a very convincing advertisement. My 14-year-old super mutt is a VERY picky eater, but as soon as I offered it to him, he gobbled it up. I'm not sure about the touted benefits since it's only been a day or so, but so far, so good. I recommend! ***UPDATE (As of July 3, 2015)*** A friend who hasn't seen Paco in awhile remarked that he seemed much more alert and enthusiastic than in previous encounters. I suspect this food may actually be doing what it says! Try it and see for yourself :)
customer_reviews.author: Cami Annette

customer_reviews.title: Dogs like it, but can cause issues in older dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Both my dogs love this food, however we have run into an issue. The vet says my little guy's liver enzymes are up and it's likely related to the shredded meat mixed into the food. It's not a bad food, but we are probably going to have to switch. Something to look out for a consider when purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: AZDad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars! Very convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t speak to the nutritional quality of the dog food (because I am certainly no expert). However, my dogs eat it, and I have *heard* that vets recommended this dog food to some of my friends. You really can’t beat the convenience factor, though. It is so much easier when these big bags of dog food are delivered to your front door in such a quick manner than having to go to the store yourself! The price point is great, too!
customer_reviews.author: TGAJ

customer_reviews.title: My Aussie loves this combo of crunchy and softer pieces together!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 4 year old, fussy mini Aussie, and she really loves this food. The combination of the crunchies with the shredded softer chicken pieces are just perfect for her. She now eats her whole meal at once, instead of picking all day, and not enjoying her food/flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: My rescue loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I rescued a dog last weekend and I wanted something middle of the range price but not low quality. To my surprise, she gobbled this up the first day I had her (and every day since) and did not have any runny poops. Typically changing a dog's food causes some less than ideal poops, and she wasn't on this food before. I really think this food is great.
customer_reviews.author: Karlie Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Expensive. We were hoping it would stop our dog from scratching his skin so much. (Yes, he has flea & tick treatments.) He ate it, but didn't really run to it. His itching continued. The dogfood seems like a good product, but we were looking for greater results.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck***

customer_reviews.title: Crumbs Thoughout the Bag so much filler its gross
customer_reviews.text: The Quality of this product has become horrible what you normally see at the bottom of the bag and vary little of like filler their is so much of it though out the bag my dog's turn there noses up at the product now used to have this on autoship but have been skipping it every month and going with another brand for now
customer_reviews.author: RollCall9

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: When I by Parina pro from the pet store my dog Does very well on the food . When I buy it online he gets sick . Buyer beware you Never know what your getting online . go to a pet store!!!
customer_reviews.author: allan sansone

customer_reviews.title: DOG meat in their dog food
customer_reviews.text: just FYI they are in the middle of a lawsuit because horse and dog meat was found in their fillers. if a food isn't made in America they don't have the same regulatory standards
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod T.

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: I have been feeding this brand (bought from the actual store) to my dog for a long time. We have always loved it.... Unfortunately, I ordered this bag from Amazon and my dog got extremely sick. She was vomiting and started having horrible painful skin reactions. For the safety of all pups please just be careful when ordering dog food from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: which is a lot better than the stuff he used to get
customer_reviews.text: My boy loves this food, which is a lot better than the stuff he used to get. You can see the chunks of chicken right in the food and I can see when he goes right after them first thing. The quantity of the chicken pieces seems to be pretty good too. Can't say I've noticed any more energy or a better coat or anything after a few months being on this food, but I can tell her enjoys meal time more than he used to.
customer_reviews.author: Blake C.

customer_reviews.title: Woof
customer_reviews.text: My dog wanted to leave a review, “Woof, woof, woof, woof.”
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer P.

customer_reviews.title: Go to Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: My dog always loves this product. After only buying her Walmart Brand dog food she started eating less, her fur started losing color and her nails began to develop shells. Her Vet told us it was time to switch her to a food that had more nutrients and was a healthier fit for her. She is a 70 lb German Shepard and I couldn’t be happier with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Willackie

customer_reviews.title: Something changed
customer_reviews.text: I've been feeding my dogs the shredded chicken and rice for 5 years now with no problems. Since Purina added the probiotics they won't eat it. It even smells and looks different. Not as many shredded bits. I've even tried adding canned wet food and that doesn't help either. What happened?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All Around GREAT Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: My dog LOVES this food!! Every time I put it down, my 11 yr. old Maltese mix gobbles it right up. This has NEVER been the case, as she is a VERY PICKY eater. Because of the additional chewy pieces, it is very easy to add medication wrapped in a very small piece of Pill Pockets. I'm using very few pockets, and saving money.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn A. Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Dog will not eat it.
customer_reviews.text: My dog will not eat this food. He will pick out the shredded chicken and toss it around and play with it.
customer_reviews.author: A. W.

customer_reviews.title: Almost 20 years now....
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Pro Plan for about 20 years now. My old lab mix, Romeo, passed away at 16. I am still feeding it to my American Staff mix, and she will be 12 next February. Seems to have worked great for them. BTW, even with one digit down and 11, she still chases squirrels like a rocket!
customer_reviews.author: DnAustin

customer_reviews.title: Loved it until...!
customer_reviews.text: Until I read the ingredients breakdown on this site  I loved this food for my 3 dogs...also use the puppy food with the same outcome review. Ugh! Been buying it for many months now...not anymore and especially since the price has increased by 5 to 9 dollars! At the very least take a look at the link. I'm very disappointed I didn't research sooner! Shame on me!
customer_reviews.author: cmac

customer_reviews.title: Grains for the win
customer_reviews.text: My two Golden’s love it. I recently switched from a high end boutique brand due to the increased health issues found in large breeds. I was shocked when my dogs loved this food and eat it every time which I couldn’t say before with other foods. I guess grain really is best.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Good food for dogs
customer_reviews.text: Giving the flavor a high mark was really just a guess overall. My dogs of different sizes are very happy with the flavor it seems like. It was an easy transition from their previous food and I haven’t seen any stomach issues.
customer_reviews.author: Dido

customer_reviews.title: Thank you... Purina Savor Adult
customer_reviews.text: I have never seen my two lab mixes get so excited about meal time...my "Big Mac" even goes over and sets beside the bag giving me a subtle hint. It appears we have a new feed for my buddies and couldnt be happier as I had always spent extra, in buying a wet dog food to mix in with other dry feeds to get them to eat it. This has been a homerun for me. Has been no issue with digestive tract in two weeks of use now. Found a keeper
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: My dog is a fan
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because I couldn't find the one I usually get my beagle online. He loved this dog food. He generally isn't much of an eater, but when I started feeding this to him, he would eat right away and beg for more.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Fresh dog food!
customer_reviews.text: I love trying new things so I was hoping my dog would like to try new things too! Bought this for him and he wasn’t a fan! However the bag came packaged nicely and arrived on time! No seals were broken! But my dog wasn’t a big fan of of the taste!
customer_reviews.author: Paula and Minh

customer_reviews.title: Way different than what you get in stores
customer_reviews.text: I normally purchase this at TSC but they never have 35lb bags. So I thought hey this is perfect. Well I’ve ordered 2 bags from amazon and both smelled awful compared to what I get at TSC in the larger 47 lb bag. The dogs burps and farts are more often and smell awful. I’m only going to buy it at my TSC from now on.
customer_reviews.author: John Hart

customer_reviews.title: Dog wouldn’t touch and vomited
customer_reviews.text: My dog was on science Diet and I decided to try this because it was a Little cheaper but she wouldn’t touch it and when she did she would throw up. I have it 3 stars because the company refunded without having to return.
customer_reviews.author: Niece party of 5

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It is great being able to have this giant bag delivered right to your door! Exactly what you get in the store except cheaper. You can find sometimes cheaper in the store but it is worth putting it on subscribe and save and not having to worry.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Lee

customer_reviews.title: Sick pup
customer_reviews.text: My dog was sick for over a week. Pure liquid Diarrhea. Cost me $100. At the vet for antibiotics, pro biotic, and stool testing. I like the brand but I would not recommend this flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Anynoym

customer_reviews.title: Yummy for Four Tummies, one "sensitive"
customer_reviews.text: Taste of Wild or Purina ProPlan Chicken are Both are equally loved by 2 female chihuahuas, male dachshund, and the chi-weenie baby of the younger chi and dachshund. I find a slight pref for this one among all 4. We even get a bit if growling between the 2 chi females when dinner is served. My male has a sensitive stomach which has 3 pancreatic flare ups and a few grand in overnight vet stays and tolerates this and tow wonderfully. I'm recording our 3rd 35lb bag so everyone loves it. Funny aside..there are some larger morsels that must taste better than the others b/c the 2 female chi eat around the bowl and pick these out first.
customer_reviews.author: Niki Mik

customer_reviews.title: Good quality kibble
customer_reviews.text: This kibble comes in a variety of sizes and flavors. It is excellent quality. My dogs like it when they have nothing else to eat. I think they would like it more if they were not so spoiled with getting homemade and canned dog food. This is good for getting the plaque off the dog's teeth and good for strong bones and joints. It also gives their coat a healthy shine.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Spoiled Batch
customer_reviews.text: Usually my dog loves this brand. When I purchased the larger bag which was on sale he threw up everyday. I was not sure if he'd gotten into something but I went and and purchased the brand again from a different vender and he didn't throw up one time. Had to be something wrong with this batch.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadene Fielder

customer_reviews.title: Pups like it and it was recommended by my vet!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the brands my vet recommended for my dogs that they actually like. We tried all 3 recommendations and I had to mix this in with the other 2 recommendations for them to eat it so it wouldn't go to waste.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Quality nutrition for my picky eater
customer_reviews.text: Bought this dog food for my Great Dane, she's a very picky eater at times, wouldn't eat her regular dog food she has been on for last 2 years, I put some of this dog food in her bowl and she loved it and cleaned the whole bowl, I was amazed! She has been eating this regularly for about a month now with no problems, I mix a little warm water in it to make a gravy and she loves it. Glad I took a chance and tried it!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food!! She had been a fussy eater before I found this brand. Now, she never turns away, but gobbles up every last bite!! No digestion problem either and she is thriving! I highly recommend this food!!
customer_reviews.author: Former New Yorker

customer_reviews.title: Will make your dog sick
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst dog food ever. Everytime I feed this to my dog, he would get sick. I have a 2 year old labrador retriever and his tummy gets upset even when I mix this food with another food during transition.
customer_reviews.author: rrlamichhane

customer_reviews.title: Too big for 15lbs dog
customer_reviews.text: She bites into smaller pieces but the kibbles are still very crumbly, so she spills outside the bowl. And I guess the smaller pieces does not taste great 'cause she won't touch it. It seems like she just chews for fun. My dog is very picky though.
customer_reviews.author: miniworlds

customer_reviews.title: Makes my dog sick
customer_reviews.text: Since using this product my lab doodle has been throwing up. We thought it might be something outside she got into, so we tried another couple of days, but now it is constantly. Too late to return. Yuk. Won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jefferis Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Good premium dogfood
customer_reviews.text: Good premium dog food. It was not our usual dog food but our pup loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Deadly Discord

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food!
customer_reviews.text: My vet recommended this after trying every healthy and special dog food out there. Our dog kept has loose stools and other issues, and about 2 weeks on this food, his stools were already better. He’s been on this food for about 2 years now and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: The Johnsons

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I recently made the switch from Royal Canine and my dog can’t get enough of this food! He absolutely loves it. I love the ability to purchase such a large size bag that will last ya a few months. The ingredients are great.
customer_reviews.author: Alesha

customer_reviews.title: Corgi + vet approved
customer_reviews.text: Corgi approved as well as our vet. My dog can be picky with food but with Purine pro plan savor he finishes every bite. Vet recommended this for our dog due to the heavy testing. Do not recommend purina " puppy chow". Pro plan is tested and we'll balanced dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE!! Worms and bugs found in the food
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this and found it was infested with worms and black bugs living inside the meat chunks. I am not sure how many of these bugs my dogs consumed before I found them! I horrified!! I will be taking my dogs to the vet today to make sure they are okay!
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Got Sick
customer_reviews.text: I was purchasing this in a retail location and found it here. Ordered a bag and before I got halfway through the bag, my dog started getting sick. Stomach issues, vomiting and stool issues. Will not order dog food online again.
customer_reviews.author: David D. Allen III

customer_reviews.title: My picky eater
customer_reviews.text: My very picky Karelian Bear Dog Ives this stuff! He seems happy and healthy and his coat is very thick and shiny. Once my pups are old enough I will switch them from the Pro Plan puppy to this.
customer_reviews.author: Lynsey

customer_reviews.title: Happy girls!
customer_reviews.text: Looks like the girls really like this...I put there old food in a bowl and the new food in another bowl ...they just sniffed the old food and walked away ...made like 3 trips back to this food bowl !
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Dog food Science Diet and EN  bags
customer_reviews.text: I still not hear back where my other 2 Nagasaki of dog food that you promised 0 charge. The initial order was screwed up but I want those those other two ypu promised me Thank you very much !!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great for Subscribe and Save
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using this for our dogs with Subscribe and save for quite a few years now. We have 2 large labs and get either 1 or 2 bags a month. We always like to have a bag on backup so change between 1 and 2 depending on how much stock we have. My dogs seem to love it. Nice to have large items like this delivered to your door
customer_reviews.author: Meghan L

customer_reviews.title: Driver dropped a 35 pound bag of dog food in my flower bed.
customer_reviews.text: The driver dropped a 35 pound bag of dog food in my flower bed outside of my front gate and left it there. He didn't even get it in my front yard let alone on the front porch.
customer_reviews.author: Monte Dunbar

customer_reviews.title: Eat more chicken
customer_reviews.text: I keep trying to get my dogs more expensive/higher rated dog foods but something about this product makes one dog keep coming back. She absolutely loves the chicken flavor, followed by the beef, followed by literally every other dog food brand out there. The quality has been pretty consistent since we've been buying it which is a plus. My dog highly recommends!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure what is going on exactly. My 3 Pit Bulls love Purina Pro Plan, but this batch/bag they will not touch, they smell it and walk away. Expiration is 10/2018, so it should still be good? I googled to see if there is any recalls, but could not find any. I would like to know how Amazon is storing their dry dog food brands? Does anyone else have this problem?
customer_reviews.author: Sinai

customer_reviews.title: Probiotic works for Dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have a Rottie, I have alway fed her the Purina Pro Plan, but i fed her the Sport. She has trouble getting constipated. i changed to this Pro Biotic and she has not had any problems since. so glad i switched.
customer_reviews.author: Abi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and incredible results!
customer_reviews.text: Best food for my chocolate lab! The probiotics are an added digestion bonus! She was born with cancer and had a 4 pound tumor and kidney removed when she was a few months old and this brand has by far exceeded our every expectations! Always getting compliments on her shiny coat and healthy weight! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Bennett

customer_reviews.title: one super picky eater
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've tried this dog food. I have two dogs, one super picky eater, the other prefers socks. I used to put dry food out all day (premium dog food), add a 1/2 can of dog food to it at night to entice them to eat. With the Purina, I have to watch how much I put out because they scarf it up! I'm going to have two fat dogs soon!
customer_reviews.author: Jo V

product_meta.title: Purina Pro Plan with Probiotics Shredded Blend High Protein, Adult Dry Dog Food Chicken & Rice
product_meta.description:
Style:Dry Food| Flavor Name:Chicken & Rice| Size:35 lb. BagGet your dog excited about mealtime with Purina Pro Plan SAVOR Shredded Blend Chicken & Rice Formula adult dry dog food. Real chicken is the #1 ingredient and we add rice, an excellent source of carbohydrates for energy, to create a wholesome meal with great flavor. The hard kibble and tender shredded pieces provide a texture that keeps him engaged. Feel good about serving him the 100 percent complete and balanced nutrition for adult dogs he needs every day. Each serving contains optimal levels of protein and fat to help him maintain an ideal body condition. Vitamin A and linoleic acid, an omega 6 fatty acid, promote healthy skin and coat to keep him looking great, and guaranteed live probiotics help to support his digestive health. This highly digestible adult dog food helps promote nutrient availability and absorption. Formulated with high quality protein and other essential nutrients, Purina Pro Plan SAVOR dry dog food helps support your beloved pet's overall health and wellness.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
On the journey towards greatness, your dog deserves to have it all. Purina(R) Pro Plan(R) is dedicated to helping owners and their dogs realize their potential through high-quality, great-tasting nutrition--giving dogs the chance to be, and feel, exceptional.
feature_bullets: One (1) 35 pounds Bag Purina Pro Plan With Probiotics Dry Dog Food, SAVOR Shredded Blend Chicken & Rice Formula
Made with high quality protein, including real chicken as the first ingredient
Fortified with guaranteed live probiotics to support digestive & immune health
Crunchy kibble and tender, meaty pieces create a delightful textural combination
Vitamin A and linoleic acid, an omega 6 fatty acid, support healthy skin and a shiny coat

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
